name: Verify Create Account button is disabled when terms not accepted
description: Validates that the Create Account button remains disabled when the Terms and Conditions checkbox is not checked.
descriptionHtml: Validates that the Create Account button remains disabled when the Terms and Conditions checkbox is not checked.
statusMessage: Create Account button should be disabled when Terms and Conditions are not accepted. ==> expected: <false> but was: <true>
